title: Frost Daggerfish
summaries: The Frost Daggerfish is a consumable ranged weapon that can pierce up to two enemies (hitting 3). Depending to player's final Fishing Power, from 7 to 137 Frost Daggerfish can be fished from lakes in Snow biomes at a time. When thrown, the Frost Daggerfish acts similarly to Shurikens or Throwing Knives, flying in an arc and then spinning to the ground, where they break upon impact and cannot be recovered.
The <linked>Angler</linked> uses Frost Daggerfish to defend himself against nearby enemies.

statistics.Sell: 16 CC
